summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing execution of a Memorandum of Understanding effective through December 31, 1991, and a collective bargaining agreement effective through December 31, 1994, between The City of Seattle and United Association of Journeymen and Apprentices of the Plumbing and Pipe Fitting Industry, Local 32 (Water Department Crew Chiefs and Plumber Crew Chiefs); authorizing a one-time, lump-sum payment; and providing payment therefor.
